blogPost.excerpt: Toad is the simplest URL shortener with a built-in API, detailed analytics, and custom domain support. Toad is built to be fun yet powerful. What's stopping you? Make the leap!
blogPost.body: Toad is the simplest URL shortener with a built-in API, detailed analytics, and custom domain support. Toad is built to be fun yet powerful. What's stopping you? Make the leap!
blogPost.title: Toad - The simplest URL shortener
blogPost.author: Zach Waterfield

localize.description: Toad是最简单的URL缩短器，具有内置的API，详细的分析和自定义域名支持。Toad的设计既有趣又强大。是什么阻止了你？跃跃欲试吧
Toad是最簡單的URL縮短器，具有內置的API，詳細的分析和自定義域名支持。Toad的設計既有趣又強大。是什麼阻止了你？躍躍欲試吧

previous.excerpt: Generate high quality tweets for the lazy weekends when you're out of tweet ideas. Jokes, Quotes, shower thoughts, facts and LPTs, all for free🔥 Comes with inbuilt button to fire up a canva canvas and tweet beautiful graphics fast! Enjoy!
previous.title: Tweet Ideas - Never run out of tweets again with this content generator

localize.description: 在懒散的周末，当你没有了推文创意时，生成高质量的推文。笑话、名言、想法、事实和LPTs，全部免费🔥内嵌按钮，启动canva画布，快速生成漂亮的图文。享受吧
localize.tagline: 有了这个内容生成器，永远不会再没有推文了。

localize.description: 在懶散的週末，當你沒有了推文創意時，生成高質量的推文。笑話、名言、想法、事實和LPTs，全部免費🔥內嵌按鈕，啓動canva畫布，快速生成漂亮的圖文。享受吧
localize.tagline: 有了這個內容生成器，永遠不會再沒有推文了。

next.excerpt: Do you find yourself digging through email threads trying to find the version of a contract in which a specific change was introduced? Who proposed the change? Was it your lawyer, or your customer? If this pain is familiar, Version Story is here to help.
next.title: Version Story - Git for lawyers

localize.description: 你是否发现自己在邮件中翻阅邮件线程，试图找到引入特定变更的合同版本？是谁提出的修改？是您的律师，还是您的客户？如果这种痛苦是熟悉的，版本故事在这里帮助你。
你是否發現自己在郵件中翻閱郵件線程，試圖找到引入特定變更的合同版本？是誰提出的修改？是您的律師，還是您的客戶？如果這種痛苦是熟悉的，版本故事在這裏幫助你。
